verses.verse: But realize <S%G1097><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> that in the last <S%G2078><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> difficult <S%G5467><s%> times <S%G2540><s%> will come. <S%G1764><s%>

For men <S%G444><s%> will be lovers <S%G5367><s%> of self, <S%G5367><s%> lovers <S%G5366><s%> of money, <S%G5366><s%> boastful, <S%G213><s%> arrogant, <S%G5244><s%> revilers, <S%G989><s%> disobedient <S%G545><s%> to parents, <S%G1118><s%> ungrateful, <S%G884><s%> unholy, <S%G462><s%>
unloving, <S%G794><s%> irreconcilable, <S%G786><s%> malicious <S%G1228><s%> gossips, <S%G1228><s%> without <S%G193><s%> self-control, brutal, <S%G434><s%> haters <S%G865><s%> of good, <S%G865><s%>

treacherous, <S%G4273><s%> reckless, <S%G4312><s%> conceited, <S%G5187><s%> lovers <S%G5369><s%> of pleasure <S%G5369><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> lovers <S%G5377><s%> of God; <S%G5377><s%>
holding <S%G2192><s%> to a form <S%G3446><s%> of godliness, <S%G2150><s%> although they have denied <S%G720><s%> its power; <S%G1411><s%> and avoid <S%G665><s%> such men as these. <S%G3778><s%>

For among <S%G1537><s%> them are those <S%G3588><s%> who enter <S%G1746><s%> into households <S%G3614><s%> and captivate <S%G163><s%> weak <S%G1133><s%> women <S%G1133><s%> weighed <S%G4987><s%> down <S%G4987><s%> with sins, <S%G266><s%> led <S%G71><s%> on by various <S%G4164><s%> impulses, <S%G1939><s%>
always <S%G3842><s%> learning <S%G3129><s%> and never <S%G3368><s%> able <S%G1410><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of the truth. <S%G225><s%>

And just <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5158><s%> as Jannes <S%G2389><s%> and Jambres <S%G2387><s%> opposed <S%G436><s%> Moses, <S%G3475><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> [men <S%G444><s%>] also <S%G2532><s%> oppose <S%G436><s%> the truth, <S%G225><s%> men of depraved <S%G2704><s%> mind, <S%G3563><s%> rejected <S%G96><s%> as regards <S%G4012><s%> the faith. <S%G4102><s%>

But they will not make <S%G4298><s%> further <S%G1909><s%> <S%G4183><s%> progress; <S%G4298><s%> for their folly <S%G454><s%> will be obvious <S%G1552><s%> to all, <S%G3956><s%> as also <S%G2532><s%> that of those <S%G1565><s%> [two] came <S%G1096><s%> to be.
But you followed <S%G3877><s%> my teaching, <S%G1319><s%> conduct, <S%G72><s%> purpose, <S%G4286><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> patience, <S%G3115><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> perseverance, <S%G5281><s%>

persecutions, <S%G1375><s%> [and] sufferings, <S%G3804><s%> such <S%G3634><s%> as happened <S%G1096><s%> to me at Antioch, <S%G490><s%> at Iconium <S%G2430><s%> [and] at Lystra; <S%G3082><s%> what <S%G3634><s%> persecutions <S%G1375><s%> I endured, <S%G5297><s%> and out of them all <S%G3956><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> delivered <S%G4506><s%> me!
And indeed, <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> who desire <S%G2309><s%> to live <S%G2198><s%> godly <S%G2153><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> will be persecuted. <S%G1377><s%>
But evil <S%G4190><s%> men <S%G444><s%> and impostors <S%G1114><s%> will proceed <S%G4298><s%> [from bad] to worse, <S%G5501><s%> deceiving <S%G4105><s%> and being deceived. <S%G4105><s%>

You, however, <S%G1161><s%> continue <S%G3306><s%> in the things <S%G3739><s%> you have learned <S%G3129><s%> and become convinced <S%G4104><s%> of, knowing <S%G3609><s%> from whom <S%G5101><s%> you have learned <S%G3129><s%> [them];

and that from childhood <S%G1025><s%> you have known <S%G3609><s%> the sacred <S%G2413><s%> writings <S%G1121><s%> which are able <S%G1410><s%> to give <S%G4679><s%> you the wisdom <S%G4679><s%> that leads <S%G1519><s%> to salvation <S%G4991><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> which is in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> Scripture <S%G1124><s%> is inspired <S%G2315><s%> by God <S%G2315><s%> and profitable <S%G5624><s%> for teaching, <S%G1319><s%> for reproof, <S%G7064><s%> for correction, <S%G1882><s%> for training <S%G3809><s%> in righteousness; <S%G1343><s%>
that the man <S%G444><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> may be adequate, <S%G739><s%> equipped <S%G1822><s%> for every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work. <S%G2041><s%>
